caption: Figure 4. The Chain of Search algorithm (§ 3.2). We deduce the update of the directed graph when k=1,2,..., and the web knowledge is progressively extracted from each update.
description: The chart illustrates the iterative process of the Chain of Search algorithm, showing how it progressively expands a directed graph to obtain comprehensive web knowledge.
section: 3.2. Web Knowledge Search: The Chain of Search
